reviews.author: NeilBrown (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer NeilBrown pointed out a potential issue in the Apparmor patch, suggesting to use simple_start_creating() and simple_done_creating(), but did not provide specific technical concerns.

reviews.author: Amir Goldstein
reviews.summary: Reviewer Amir Goldstein raised concerns about the patch 'Apparmor: Use simple_start_creating() / simple_done_creating()' in a series of patches to centralize directory locking for name operations, questioning the need for a new lock when re-opening created files and suggesting improvements to kernel-doc comments.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Jeff Layton reviewed multiple patches in the series and provided Reviewed-by tags for most of them, but also pointed out a minor issue in patch 04/13 where a function should return NULL.
